## K-Means
```{r}
df <- read.table("Dataset_Pat/wdbc.data", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
df <- df[, -c(1, 2)]
# drops <- "M"
# df <- df[, !(names(df) %in% drops)]

head(df)
```


```{r}
km.res <- kmeans(scale(df), 6, nstart = 30)
km.res
```


```{r}
color_pallet <- c("#2E9FDF", "#00AFBB", "#E7B800", "#FC4E07", "#00FF00", "pink", "lightblue", "purple")

fviz_cluster(km.res, data = df,
             palette = color_pallet,
             ellipse.type = "euclid", # Concentration ellipse
             star.plot = TRUE, # Add segments from centroids to items
             # repel = TRUE, # Avoid label overplotting (slow)
             ggtheme = theme_minimal()
)
```

## Hierarchical
```{r}
df_h <- read.csv("Dataset_Maryam/mtcars.csv", header = TRUE)
rownames(df_h) <- df$model

drops <- "model"
df_h <- df_h[, !(names(df_h) %in% drops)]
df_h <- na.omit(df_h)

df_h
```

```{r}
res.dist <- dist(df_h, method = "euclidean")
res.dist
```


```{r}
as.matrix(res.dist)[1:6, 1:6]
```


```{r}
res.hc <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "ward.D2")
res.hc
```

```{r}
fviz_dend(
  res.hc,
  k = 2,
  cex = 0.5, # label size
  k_colors = color_pallet,
  color_labels_by_k = TRUE, # color labels by groups
  rect = TRUE # Add rectangle around groups
)
```

```{r}
fviz_nbclust(df_h, hcut, nstart = 25, method = "gap_stat")
```

```{r}
grp <- cutree(res.hc, k = 2)

fviz_cluster(list(data = df_h, cluster = grp),
             palette = color_pallet,
             ellipse.type = "convex", # Concentration ellipse
             repel = TRUE, # Avoid label overplotting (slow)
             show.clust.cent = FALSE,
             ggtheme = theme_minimal())
```
